help.description: Displays all commands and their usage if there is an argument.
help.ArgsError: Error: more than one argument is not allowed
help.footer: For more information about a specific command, use !help <command>.

ping.description: Responds with "Pong!" when the command is used.
ping.error: The command "!ping" does not accept additional arguments.

userinfo.description: Displays information about a specific user.
userinfo.error: User with the name not found

roles.description: Displays each role in the server and the users that have that role, excluding @everyone and the bot's role.

setlanguage.description: Changes the bot's language in the server.
setlanguage.noPermissions: You do not have permission to change the bot's language.
setlanguage.invalidLanguage: The selected language is not valid.
setlanguage.success: The bot's language has been changed
setlanguage.timeout: The time to change the language has expired.
setlanguage.alreadySet: The selected language is already set for this server.

roulette.description: Starts a roulette with the participants that react to the message.
roulette.no_participants: There are not enough participants to play.
roulette.participate: Participate in the roulette by interacting with the emoji
